definition: traditionally used as phonetic for ga/also pr. [ga1]/also pr. [qie2]
horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

sentences.english: The paper introduces the frame principle of a portable natural gamma spectrum.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种便携式天然伽马能谱测量仪的框图原理。

sentences.english: Real exam ples prove the necessity of gamma spectrometry log.
sentences.chinese: 文中通过实例强调了伽马能谱测井的必要性。

sentences.english: Use this treatment by 9 months later, the cancer got smaller Obviously.
sentences.chinese: 伽马刀治疗九个月后随访图片，肿瘤明显缩小。

sentences.english: Theseclouds emit gamma rays when struck by high-speed particles escaping the remnants.
sentences.chinese: 这些云在高速粒子冲击下发射伽马射线逃离该残骸。

sentences.english: This thesis is concentrated on the temporal variability analysis of the prompt emission of the GRBs.
sentences.chinese: 本论文的研究集中于伽马暴本身辐射的时变分析。

sentences.english: The higher a gamma ray’s energy, the shorter its wavelength.
sentences.chinese: 众所周知，伽马射线能量越高，则波长越短。

sentences.english: According to calculations, the tiny grains would affect the way that gamma rays travel through space.
sentences.chinese: 根据计算，微粒会影响伽马射线在宇宙中的运动轨迹。

sentences.english: The gamma ray spectrums provide the PIPA equipment with baseline data for analysis.
sentences.chinese: 伽马射线光谱向PIPA设备提供最基本的分析数据。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate gamma knife radiosurgery for adrenal gland metastases.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨肾上腺转移瘤的伽马刀治疗效果。

sentences.english: Liverpool are poised for a January move for Vasco da Gama starlet Nilton.
sentences.chinese: 据报道利物浦一月份希望引进达伽马的新星尼尔顿。

sentences.english: Use this treatment by2 years later, the cancer almost disappeared.
sentences.chinese: 伽马刀治疗两年后，肿瘤消失。

sentences.english: And this will require observations of many more GRBs.
sentences.chinese: 这就需要观测更多的伽马射线爆发目标。

sentences.english: The radiation takes the form of high-frequency gamma rays.
sentences.chinese: 这种辐射是以高频伽马射线的形式出现的。

sentences.english: However, GRBs are rare in galaxies like the Milky Way.
sentences.chinese: 然而，像银河系这样的星系中，伽马射线爆很少发生。

sentences.english: Gama indicated that all Portuguese parties support both sides to develop friendly relations.
sentences.chinese: 伽马表示，葡萄牙各党派都支持葡中发展友好关系。

sentences.english: You see that Gamma basically killed every cell in your body.
sentences.chinese: 你所见的伽马几乎可以杀死你全身的每个细胞。

definition: Ur (Sumerian city c. 4500 BC in modern Iraq)
Fermi (name)/Enrico Fermi (1901-1954), Italian born US nuclear physicist
Kara, city in northern Togo 多哥[Duo1 ge1]/Cara, Karla etc (name)
